page.title: 01MALVERN WELLS IN OUTLINE
page.content: The people of{Malvern Wells}and{Little {Malvern}have life styles to which many people would aspire. The impression is of an affluent and law abiding community which values much that is traditional. In this semi-rural area a car appears to be a virtual necessity for employment, shopping and entertainment. The scenic beauty of the{Malvern Hills}and the views over the Severn plain and Herefordshire are major attractions. Activities and places associated with the area include education, farming, health care, recreation, tourism, Elgar's music, and the 3 Counties Show, Little Malvern Priory, British Camp, St.Wulstans Hospital and the Holy Well. The area has lost its branch railway line; but it does have new industries, housing estates and new methods of farming and conservation.
